NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 187? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {190} from {DuffyLLCOnline} to {AtkinsonExpress}, a flow of {198} from {AtkinsonExpress} to {DuffyLLCOnline}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 74? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from AtkinsonExpress to Garcia Global or from Garcia Global to WeberGroupMart?
NC.A: The flow from {Garcia Global} to {WeberGroupMart} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from AtkinsonExpress to DuffyLLCOnline, from Potter.com to WeberGroupMart, or from AtkinsonExpress to Garcia Global?
NC.A: The flow from {AtkinsonExpress} to {DuffyLLCOnline} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {AtkinsonExpress} and {DuffyLLCOnline}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Potter.com, Arc WeberGroupMart, Arc Garcia Global, Arc AtkinsonExpress, Arc DuffyLLCOnline}.
